targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * sum(kube_pod_info{created_by_kind!="Job",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) * 100

sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * sum(kube_pod_info{created_by_kind!="Job",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node))  / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) * 100

panels.title: Number of pods by waiting reason

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * sum(kube_pod_info{created_by_kind!="Job",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node))

sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * sum(kube_pod_info{created_by_kind!="Job",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node))

sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * sum(kube_pod_info{created_by_kind!="Job",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) * 100

sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * sum(kube_pod_info{created_by_kind!="Job",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) by (namespace, pod, node))  / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",kubernetes_cluster_name="$cluster"}) * 100
